Title: A-1: Implement /evidence/register
Body: Implements POST /evidence/register in prov-ledger; includes hashing & metadata persistence.

Title: A-2: Transform recorder middleware
Body: Middleware to log operation+model+config checksum for each transform.

Title: A-3: Export hash-manifest.json (Merkle)
Body: Generate verifiable manifest tree for exports.

Title: A-4: prov-verify CLI
Body: External verification tool with diffing and nonzero exit on tamper.

Title: A-5: Export blocker policy evaluation
Body: OPA pass-through for export policy with readable block reasons.

Title: B-1: nl_to_cypher module
Body: TS lib to compose schema-aware prompts → Cypher + cost estimate.

Title: B-2: Cost estimator & preview panel
Body: UI panel to preview Cypher + cost before run.

Title: B-3: Sandbox executor + undo/redo
Body: Sandboxed exec with result preview and reversible ops.

Title: B-4: NL→Cypher corpus + tests
Body: Corpus and tests achieving ≥95% syntactic validity.
